verses.roman:
suna' saba bhaṭṭathāri uṭhe astra lañā
māribāre āila sabe cāri-dike dhāñā

synonyms: suna'-hearing; saba—all; bhaṭṭathāri—nomads; uṭhe—rise up; astra—weapons; lañā—taking; māribāre—to kill; āila—came; sabe—all; cāri-dike—all around; dhāñā—running.
translation: Upon hearing Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, all the Bhaṭṭathāris came running from all sides with weapons in their hands, desiring to hurt the Lord.
